themes: concern about overemphasis on DEI in funding criteria
challenges for niche classical music groups
key_phrases: please don't make DEI the be all and the end all in funding
not every group can embody these ideals
due to the nature of their specific niche of classical music represented
barriers_identified: inability of niche groups to meet DEI criteria
solutions_proposed: avoid making DEI the sole or overriding criterion in funding decisions
